VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
Maltreatment in Care
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period.
Corrective Action Plan Compliance
The agency has submitted 2 acceptable corrective action plans (CAP) during this
licensing period, and compliance with each individual CAP is as follows:
The agency renewal inspection was completed on 8/8/2023 and the CAP was
approved on 8/21/2023. The agency was cited for two violations:
• Employee Records R.400.10113: they are currently compliant. All
references were in each employee file.
• Resident Release Report R 400.10211: they are currently compliant: All
release reports contained the addresses of the youth released.
SIR2023C000466; CAP approval date 9/14/2023:
• Employee Policies and Procedures R 400.10107: New procedures have
been established for new employees including HR documents, interview
questions, staff probationary periods, and shadowing of trained staff.
